Nov. 20, 2010 D Scottish Challenge Shield
Scottish Challenge Shield 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Scottish BBA Festival of Brass scottish-challenge-shield
3 Separate Adjudicator Boxes (Test Piece)
Perth Concert Hall, Perth, Perth & Kinross, Scotland, UK Adj A: Stephen Roberts (tie-breaker) Adj B: Les Neish Adj C: Brian Buckley
Open adjudication was employed at this contest.
(As Per Grading Tables BEFORE 1st Nov 2010) Best 1st Section Band: Johnstone Silver Best 2nd Section Band: Dalkeith & Monktonhall Best 3rd Section Band: Kilmarnock Concert Brass Best 4th Section Band: Dumfries Town
Nov. 21, 2010, 9:51 a.m. Nov. 25, 2013, 11:03 p.m.
